alert.note: Alert for Aransas; Refugio (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 27 at 9:55AM CDT until April 27 at 10:15AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 AM CDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL ARANSAS AND CENTRAL REFUGIO COUNTIES... At 954 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Quintana, or 7 miles southeast of Refugio, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Refugio and Quintana. This includes US Highway 77 between mile markers 608 and 622. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
